Sick of coronavirus quarantine? Why not play a game about . . . an incurable, unstoppable disease ravaging its way through the planet?

You are Dr. Conor Chase, an astrophysics professor at Stanford. Slowly dying from a mysterious and incurable disease, you are granted a last chance at life: you have been chosen as the first person to be put in cryonic sleep as part of a secretive medical trial. What kind of world will you wake up in?

Game link: http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/bzcsluxzweoo7mdyk-hnhq/arc-ii
